name: The Crucifixion
description: The Crucifixion; Hans von Aachen (German, 1552 - 1615); about 1587; Pen and brown ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache, over black chalk; 33.3 x 45.9 cm (13 1/8 x 18 1/16 in.); 92.GA.83; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Crucifixion
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache, over black chalk
